title: General Store sign
content:
Could anyone help i.d this font? It may be hand-painted, but you may know something similar with the sexy 'R'? Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020012158im_/http:/typophile.com/files/General-Store-mogollon-L_6031.jpg)
author: Bloodtype

comments.content:
Obviously this is not done with a digital font, but you can probably find some similar styles by searching for "Western" or by looking at the collection at Letterhead Fonts. They specialize in many antique styles.

- Mike Yanega
